```{r setup, include=FALSE}

require("summarytools")
require("tpotr")
require("mlr")
require("lime")
```

## Raw Dataset

```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE}
print(dfSummary(mtcars, plain.ascii = FALSE, style = "grid", graph.magnif = 0.75, tmp.img.dir = "/tmp"))
#dfSummary(data, plain.ascii = FALSE, style = "grid")
```

## Fitting a machine learning pipeline
```{r echo=FALSE}
learner = makeLearner(cl = "classif.tpot", predict.type = "prob", population_size = 10, generations = 15, verbosity = 2)
mod = train(learner, task = iris.task)
print("The fitted pipeline is: ")
print(mod$learner.model$TPOTObject$fitted_pipeline_)
predict(obj = mod, newdata = iris[37:43,])
```

## Explaining the pipeline model
```{r echo=FALSE}
explainer = lime(iris, mod)
explanation = explain(iris[37:43,], explainer, n_labels = 1, n_features = 4)
plot_features(explanation)

```
